wait_message: Please wait {1} before changing your equipped item.
nopeeking: Sorry, but I either could not find the {1} item in the database, or you do not have it. Make sure that you spelled it right!
nodatabase: Sorry, but I could not find the {1} item in the database. Make sure that you spelled it right!
donthave: Sorry, but you don't have the **{1}** item.
already_equipped: You already have the **{1}** item equipped!
prompt: Would you like to change your equipped item from **{1}** to **{2}**? This can be done once every 6 hours.
no_arguments: Sorry, but the c!equip command expects 1 argument. Please see c!help for more details.
reaction_not_cooldown: An error has occured. Please make sure that you didn't recently equip another item!
stopped: <@{1}> has successfully stopped the changing of {2} equipped item.
